General.Name: Media and Games Invest PLC
General.Description: MGI - Media and Games Invest SE operates an advertising software platform with games content in North America and Europe. The company operates an ad-software platform that matches advertiser demand with publisher ad-supply enhancing results through first party data from its games. It has its own games portfolio with casual games and premium games. The company was formerly known as Media and Games Invest SE and changed its name to MGI - Media and Games Invest SE in November 2022. MGI - Media and Games Invest SE was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Stockholm, Sweden.
General.Address: St. Christopher Street 168, Valletta, Malta, VLT 1467
